tool_description: Creates visual content specifications and layout designs for social media posts based on content requirements and brand guidelines.

visual_type.description: Type of visual: image_post, story, carousel, video_thumbnail, or infographic

content_brief.description: Brief description of the visual content needed

platform.description: Target platform: instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, or pinterest

brand_colors.description: Primary brand colors in hex format

style_preference.description: Visual style: minimalist, bold, professional, playful, or elegant

include_text.description: Whether to include text overlay on the visual

text_content.description: Text to include in the visual if include_text is true

aspect_ratio.description: Preferred aspect ratio: square, portrait, landscape, or platform_default

error_messages: Invalid visual type: Use one of [image_post, story, carousel, video_thumbnail, infographic]
Invalid platform: Use one of [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, pinterest]
Invalid style preference: Use one of [minimalist, bold, professional, playful, elegant]
Invalid brand colors: Provide valid hex color codes starting with #
Invalid aspect ratio: Use one of [square, portrait, landscape, platform_default]
Missing text content: When include_text is true, provide text_content parameter
usage: Specify visual type, content brief, platform, brand colors, and style preference. Optionally include text overlay, specific text content, and aspect ratio. Returns detailed visual specifications and design recommendations.

design_specifications.description: Detailed visual design specifications and layout description

recommended_dimensions.description: Optimal pixel dimensions for the specified platform and visual type

color_palette.description: Complete color palette including brand colors and complementary colors

design_elements.description: List of visual elements to include in the design

text_placement.description: Recommended text placement and formatting if text is included
